member.name: MSV1_0_SUPPLEMENTAL_CREDENTIAL
member.summary: The MSV1_0_SUPPLEMENTAL_CREDENTIAL structure is used to pass credentials into MSV1_0 from Kerberos or custom authentication package.

member.name: MSV1_0_SUPPLEMENTAL_CREDENTIAL.Version
member.summary: Specifies the version number of the credential structure and related credential content.

summary.para: Describes the credential. This can contain one or more of the following values.

listheader.description: The credential contains a LAN Manager (LM) password stored in the LmPassword member.
The credential contains a Windows password stored in the NtPassword member.
Version information is included and is stored in the Version member.

member.name: MSV1_0_SUPPLEMENTAL_CREDENTIAL.LmPassword
member.summary: Contains the LM password. The size of this array is defined by the constant MSV1_0_OWF_PASSWORD_LENGTH. When you have finished using the password, remove the sensitive information from memory by calling SecureZeroMemory. For more information on protecting the password, see Handling Passwords.

member.name: MSV1_0_SUPPLEMENTAL_CREDENTIAL.NtPassword
member.summary: A string that contains the Windows password. The size of this array is defined by the constant MSV1_0_OWF_PASSWORD_LENGTH. When you have finished using the password, remove the sensitive information from memory by calling SecureZeroMemory.
